info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:20PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brown and northeastern McPherson Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 819 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elm Lake, or 13 miles southwest of Ellendale, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spring Creek Colony around 830 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
